language.entry: The Wyrd pariah is bereft of sophisticated weaponry or sturdy armor. However, a keen knife and strong, unflinching hand is all that she needs to conduct her blasphemous ceremonies. With such abundance of flesh, there will be no shortage of sacrifices for her dark masters.

The Wyrd Council, although admittedly passionate in its study of the Abyss, has banished a select number of individuals who they deem to be dabbling too far in dangerous, black knowledge. These so-called Pariahs are able to commmune with the most loathsome of elder gods, often in a self-destructive manner.

Deeply disturbed and unhinged, the Pariah is not someone even the mentally insane would dare make acquiantances with. However, in times of nurture and recuperation, perhaps there is some humanity left in someone so broken and hollow.
The stars align! Wretched souls gather to commune with the misshapen things that slumber beneath the forgotten crags of the earth and those that lurk above the cosmic veil.

A most nefarious malady has struck the hamlet! The townsfolk speak of terrible, cyclopean visions gnawing at the dark recesses of their thoughts. The local cultists however, seem to be in a joyous frenzy.
The Old Ones require only one vessel!
I-i don't want to die...But what else do I have?
She will come for us. But I'm happy to have met such jovial fellows.
Please stay still. This may hurt a bit.
LORD AZATHOTH, BLIND MAD GOD. GRANT US EYES.
A-are you okay with this? Servitude to Them is not a happy existence.
So much blood. I can feel Her arms!
Yes! Kill me now, it pleases Her!
My Gods smile at my pain!
Killing me only halts the inevitable!
The twisted dreamscape of Kadath...I can see it!
I have no need of your god's magic!
Do not deny me of this pain! Blood must spill!
The things...Slimy, writhing things! The tear at me!
Kill me! End this painful existence!
Perhaps on the next expedition I'll die...finally.
Aah...I can see much clearly now!
The voices! Do you hear them too?!
The Crawling Chaos! It comes our way!
It gnaws at my mind! Such wondrous feeling!
A thousand voices cry out in pain!
Out of my way! This sacrifice is mine!
No! The Old Ones wish something else of me!
That is not enough! We must draw out the screams!
She desires anguish! Do not kill them yet!
They stand there in the dark. Watching. Waiting. Conspiring.
Forget them! Here! Ruin this temple of flesh!
Here! Face me! These ones are not worthy of pain!
The enemy is weak! I must do it myself!
Fool! The ritual is not finished!
Do not deny me this bountiful harvest!
The stones...they whisper of ill fate!
They cannot hide from the ruinous powers for long...
The Old Ones grant you strength!
Do not falter! We will break them!
Pathetic! Must I do the bleeding myself?!
Avert your rage, beast! I am here!
Do not remove me, cretin! I will come for you!
Is that all,you feeble piece of filth?
Do not remove me, cretin! I will come for you!
Is that all,you feeble piece of filth?
You have lived a meaningful life, I almost envy you, friend.
It's okay to be afraid. We are mere dregs of existence, after all. It...just can't be helped.
This isn't much, but would you like some bone soup? It's all I know...
Here, friends. I carved this idol myself.

The Wyrd pariah is bereft of sophisticated weaponry or sturdy armor. However, a keen knife and strong, unflinching hand is all that she needs to conduct her blasphemous ceremonies. With such abundance of flesh, there will be no shortage of sacrifices for her dark masters.
